sentences.en: European pressure groups ( anti stem - cell, anti - software ) hijack process?
sentences.cn: 欧洲的一些反对组织 ( 反干细胞组织 、 反 软件组织 ) 将趁火打劫?

sentences.en: Every minute during the hijack seemed like a week.
sentences.cn: 被劫持过程中，每一分钟都过得如同一周那么漫长。

sentences.en: Financial globalization allowed a few to hijack the world's banking systems.
sentences.cn: 经济全球化给一些人创造了抢劫世界银行系统的机会.

sentences.en: Fly me to Cuba. I hijack the plane.
sentences.cn: 飞往古巴这架飞机我劫持了!

sentences.en: He made a desperate attempt to hijack a plane.
sentences.cn: 他铤而走险，企图劫持一架飞机。

sentences.en: Hijack ing is a form of blackmail.
sentences.cn: 劫持是敲诈的一种形式.

sentences.en: Meet the Excel 12 formula bar, or " don't hijack my grid! "
sentences.cn: 相约 Excel12 编辑栏 —— “ 请别妨碍到表格 ”

sentences.en: The airliner was hijacked by a group of terrorists.
sentences.cn: 该航班被一帮恐怖分子劫持。

sentences.en: The front page is devoted to the continuing saga of the hijack.
sentences.cn: 头版是对劫持事件的连续报道。

sentences.en: The hijack take place just after the plane take off.
sentences.cn: 劫持是飞机刚起飞后发生的.

sentences.en: There is no sign of a let - up in the hijack crisis.
sentences.cn: 绑架危机毫无缓和迹象.

sentences.en: There was a plot to hijack an airliner.
This stolen taxi was abandoned after the hijack.
sentences.cn: 在实施抢劫后,这辆偷来的出租车被丢弃了.

sentences.en: To hijack buyers into purchasing unwanted accessories.
sentences.cn: 迫使顾客购买那些不需要的附件.

sentences.en: Two men tried to hijack a plane on a flight from Riga to Murmansk.
sentences.cn: 两名男子试图劫持一架从里加飞往摩尔曼斯克的飞机。

sentences.en: Under no circumstances should you hijack OID namespace!
sentences.cn: 在任何情况下您都不要使用伪造的OID名字空间!

trans.tran_en: when a plane, vehicle etc is hijacked
to use violence or threats to take control of a plane, vehicle, or ship

trans.tran_cn: 劫持，绑架，拦路抢劫，操纵（会议等，以推销自己的意图）
trans.tran_en: to use violence or threats to take control of a plane, vehicle, or ship
